overview: Choi Yong Deuk is a hard worker in Gwandong Village and he's about to become the village chief. Yong Deuk was nominated as chief of the village for his hard-working traits and trustworthy character. However, Man Soo, a politician from Seoul decreases Yong Deuk's chances of becoming chief. Will he beat Man Soo and become the village chief?
title: Melon Scent
